thread.title: Southern, La. Tech, UL-Lafayette take LSWA honors
thread.title_full: Southern, La. Tech, UL-Lafayette take LSWA honors

title: Southern, La. Tech, UL-Lafayette take LSWA honors
text:
Southern, La. Tech, UL-Lafayette take LSWA honors By - Associated Press - Tuesday, October 13, 2015 
BATON ROUGE, La. (AP) - For the first time in the 2015 football season, there were no repeat winners in the selection for Louisiana Sports Writers Association Players of the Week. 
Quarterback Austin Howard, defensive end Jaylon Ferguson of Louisiana Tech and UL-Lafayette returner Jeryl Brazil earned the honors of the panel of LSWA voters. 
Howard accounted for six touchdowns in a 45-34 Southern win over Alabama State, while Ferguson earned the defensive honor in his first career start (a 34-31 win for Tech over UTSA). Brazil posted a 100-yard kick return to garner special team honors in the Cajuns’ 49-27 victory over Texas State.
